attributes.action: Motion to recommend the indictment of Anthony Charles Lynton Blair for breach of international law
attributes.additional_details: In respect of complaints relating to the 2003 Iraq War waged by the UK as ally to the USA, we the undersigned demand that the House recommends that Anthony Charles Lynton Blair be indicted for war crimes. This indictment relates to specific and documented material breaches of Articla 3 of the 1907 Hague Convention IV and Article 146 of  the 1949 Geneva Convention IV.
